library ieee;
use ieee.numeric_std.all;

package my_coeffs is
	constant B: natural:=16;
	constant N_coeffs: natural := 256;
	type coeff_t is array (0 to N_coeffs-1) of integer range -2**(B-1) to 2**(B-1)-1;
	constant coefficients: coeff_t:=
		(-7,-31,-12,-10,2,13,17,13,0,-15,-24,-21,-5,15,31,32,14,-13,-37,-44,

		-281,204,616,728,456,-84,-619,-864,-661,-84,583,990,894,308,-495,-1098,-1157,-594,340,1176,
		1449,960,-99,-1209,-1773,-1426,-261,1180,2140,2037,797,-1051,-2576,-2889,-1632,757,3156,4229,3100,-108,
		-4131,-6932,-6504,-1745,6922,17517,27093,32767,

		--SIMETRICO:
		32767,27093,17517,6922,-1745,-6504,-6932,-4131,-108,3100,4229,3156,
		757,-1632,-2889,-2576,-1051,797,2037,2140,1180,-261,-1426,-1773,-1209,-99,960,1449,1176,340,-594,-1157,
		-1098,-495,308,894,990,583,-84,-661,-864,-619,-84,456,728,616,204,-281,-591,-582,-282,137,
		459,528,327,-23,-337,-460,-344,-63,228,384,337,124,-135,-308,-314,-162,59,233,279,181,
		1,-167,-238,-184,-44,108,193,176,72,-59,-149,-158,-87,21,109,135,93,8,-74,-111,

end package my_coeffs;
